EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - Time Approval Notification (1343256046.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jeff, Good evening to you J. If you go to Expenses -> Review Expenses you can see a full list of what has been approved, etc. Right now everything you have entered to date has been approved aside from the rail from July 2nd (we need a receipt for that one.) I only see to meal expenses that were entered: StatusDateTypeApproved AmountReimbursement StatusClient PaidAuthorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109316_1666>Jun 4, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Parking96.00Payment Pending : $96.00$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109318_1728>Jun 4, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Rail248.00Payment Pending : $248.00$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109320_1728>Jun 5, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Medical31.65Payment Pending : $31.65$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109311_2613>Jun 14, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Meals and Entertainment53.99Payment Pending : $53.99$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109322_1728>Jun 15, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Office Equipment513.59Payment Pending : $513.59$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109313_2675>Jun 21, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Meals and Entertainment46.11Payment Pending : $46.11$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109306_4038>Jun 27, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Medical25.00Payment Pending : $25.00$0.00Authorized <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseStatusHistory&id=109308_5>Jun 27, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry>Medical32.02Payment Pending : $32.02$0.00PendingJul 2, 2012 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=ExpenseUpdate&eid=20120719235048784400000000>Rail248.00Not Authorized$0.00Total$1,294.36 It is possible you entered them and did not save them? Let me know if I can help. Thanks Jeff, Sara From: Jeff Sheftic [mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 7:03 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners - Time Approval Notification Good morning Sara. I see that two of my meal expenses got approved. There should have been to others. Did you see them? Thanks, Jeff Sent from Yahoo! Mail on Android From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>>; To: <jeffsheftic@yahoo.com <mailto:jeffsheftic@yahoo.com>>; Subject: MBO Partners - Time Approval Notification Sent: Tue, Jul 24, 2012 11:04:08 PM You have had the following time entries approved today: 07/16/2012 Broadridge Securities - Jeff Sheftic - Regular 1.0 Day 07/17/2012 Broadridge Securities - Jeff Sheftic - Regular 1.0 Day 07/18/2012 Broadridge Securities - Jeff Sheftic - Regular 1.0 Day 07/19/2012 Broadridge Securities - Jeff Sheftic - Regular 1.0 Day 07/20/2012 Broadridge Securities - Jeff Sheftic - Regular 1.0 Day
